notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Oops! The page you're looking for seems to have wandered off. It might have been moved, deleted, or you entered the wrong URL.
notFound.helpText: Still can't find what you're looking for?

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.description: Sorry! You don't have permission to access this page. This area is restricted and requires proper authentication or authorization.
unauthorized.authenticatedMessage: Your account doesn't have the required permissions for this page.
unauthorized.notAuthenticatedMessage: Please log in or create an account to access this content.

serverError.title: Internal Server Error
serverError.description: Oops! Something went wrong on our end. Our team has been notified and is working to fix the issue. Please try again in a few moments.
serverError.whatHappenedDescription: This is usually caused by a temporary server issue or maintenance. Our technical team is investigating and will resolve it as soon as possible.

maintenance.title: Under Maintenance
maintenance.description: We're currently performing some maintenance on our site. We'll be back shortly! Thank you for your patience.
maintenance.estimatedTimeDescription: We expect to complete the maintenance in approximately
maintenance.notificationDescription: We'll notify you when the maintenance is complete and the site is back online.

work.serverDesc: Updating our server infrastructure for better performance
work.featuresDesc: Adding exciting new features to improve your experience

network.title: Network Error
network.description: It looks like you're experiencing network connectivity issues. This could be due to a slow internet connection, server problems, or temporary network outage.
network.connectedMessage: Great! Your connection is working again. Redirecting you back...
network.statusMessage: We're monitoring your connection status and will automatically retry when possible.

tips.checkWifiDesc: Ensure your device is connected to a stable network
tips.refreshDesc: Sometimes a simple refresh can resolve connection issues
tips.waitDesc: Network issues are often temporary and resolve quickly
tips.contactDesc: If the problem persists, our team can help
